summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log for a staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates from July 22, 2019, to August 17, 2019. It details shift assignments, days off, sick leave, and overtime, specifically noting assignments to 'SHU #3' (Special Housing Unit). The log's timeframe includes the period leading up to and immediately following Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein found dead in cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Staff member return travel and overtime
events.description: A staff member logged 'RET TRAVEL' and overtime from 08:00 to 08:30, and later worked an 'LANS 2 OTM/W 2' shift.

events.title: Staff member overtime
events.description: A staff member worked overtime from 22:00 to 00:00 on an 'LANS 2' shift.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Q3 2019.
The log shows frequent assignments to 'SHU #3 P/M 10' (Special Housing Unit, likely Post/Midnight shift 10) for a staff member during late July and early August 2019.
The documented period (July 22 - August 17, 2019) directly encompasses the date of Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody (August 10, 2019).
The log records standard staff activities including days off, sick leave (on August 3, 2019), and overtime details.
No specific individuals are named in this excerpt; it is an administrative record of shift postings.
